page.title: 19How to get in & out of C M
page.content: The village is not very well served by public transport. The railway comes no nearer than Barnstaple and to get to anywhere one has to go via Exeter. There is an hourly bus service to Ilfracombe, and on Tuesdays and Fridays (Market days) there is a bus to Barnstaple. Loverings Garage, in the village, has a fleet of coaches available for hire. During the holiday season they run trips to local beauty spots and a weekly coach to Exeter and Plymouth. The village also has a Community Car Service to enable people to keep Hospital and Dental appointments. A phone number is manned each day to book the transport. The cost is #1.75 return to Ilfracombe,#3 return to Barnstaple and #15 return to Exeter. Spare seats may be taken for any purpose at half fare.
